@Test public void testInfiniteLoop(){
  List<Vector3D> list=Arrays.asList(new Vector3D(-0.89227075512164380,-2.89317694645713900,14.84572323743355500),new Vector3D(-0.92099498940693580,-2.31086108263908940,12.92071026467688300),new Vector3D(-0.85227999411005200,-3.06314731441320730,15.40163831651287000),new Vector3D(-1.77399413020785970,-3.65630391378114260,14.13190097751873400),new Vector3D(0.33157833272465354,-2.22813591757792160,14.21225234159008200),new Vector3D(-1.53065579165484400,-1.65692084770139570,14.61483055714788500),new Vector3D(-1.08457093941217140,-1.96100325935602980,13.09265170575555000),new Vector3D(0.30029469589708850,-3.05470831395667370,14.56352400426342600),new Vector3D(-0.95007443938638460,-1.86810946486118360,15.14491234340057000),new Vector3D(-1.89661503804130830,-2.17004080885185860,14.81235128513927000),new Vector3D(-0.72193328761607530,-1.44513142833618270,14.52355724218561800),new Vector3D(-0.26895980939606550,-3.69512371522084140,14.72272846327652000),new Vector3D(-1.53501693431786170,-3.25055166611021900,15.15509062584274800),new Vector3D(-0.71727553535519410,-3.62284279460799100,13.26256700929380700),new Vector3D(-0.30220950676137365,-3.25410412500779070,13.13682612771606000),new Vector3D(-0.04543996608267075,-1.93081853923797750,14.79497997883171400),new Vector3D(-1.53348892951571640,-3.66688919703524900,14.73095600812074200),new Vector3D(-0.98034899533935820,-3.34004481162763960,13.03245014017556800));
  WelzlEncloser<Euclidean3D,Vector3D> encloser=new WelzlEncloser<Euclidean3D,Vector3D>(1.0e-10,new SphereGenerator());
  EnclosingBall<Euclidean3D,Vector3D> ball=encloser.enclose(list);
  Assert.assertTrue(ball.getRadius() > 0);
}
